text: On 19 June 2017, the driver of a car containing guns rammed the car into a police vehicle on the Champs-Élysées in Paris, France. He was immediately killed by police. The Champs-Élysées was the site of the an attack in April. At 3:40 pm Paris local time in Paris a man attempted to ram his vehicle into a police car on the heavily guarded Champs-Élysées. The car contained an AK47 assault rifle, handguns, and a gas canister. The attacker was killed and the incident is under investigation as possible terrorism. ==References== Category:2017 crimes in Europe Category:2017 in France Category:2010s crimes in France Category:2010s in Paris Category:Islamic State Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in France Category:Islamic terrorist incidents in the 2010s Category:June 2017 events Category:Terrorist incidents in Paris Category:Terrorist incidents in Europe in 2017
title: June 2017 Champs-Élysées attack
